messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello.
I'm gonna hurt myself.
Where are you at?
I'm on N 11th St, Fresno, California.
Do you have an address?
1120 N 11th St.
What's your name?
My name is Charles.
I'm beside a white Ford.
I show 1120 N 11th St is not a valid address. Can you confirm?
It's my old house.
I'm sorry to hear that. Why do you want to hurt yourself, Charles?
It's just time for me to die. She's always been a butthead.
Who's being a butthead?
Just someone I know.
Okay, are you armed at all?
Yes.
What are you armed with?
I have a 9mm and two knives.
What are you wearing right now?
Black Dodger shirt, blue jeans, and white tennis shoes.
Have you been doing drugs or drinking today?
No drugs, just drinking.
How much have you had to drink?
A good amount.
Are you home alone? Is there anybody else there with you?
I'm by myself.
Where are you at on the property?
I'll wait right here. I won't go anywhere.
What's your birthday?
What's your last name, Charles?
Salinas. S-A-L-I-N-A-S.
So you're going to wait by the street for them?
I'm going to wait right in front of my old house.
Did you get there in a car or on foot?
I walked. I've been walking for days.
And where were you living before you went back to your old house?
I had to come home. This is where I was supposed to die.
And you don't have any family members, mom, dad, brothers, sisters?
Everybody's dead.
When officers get there, can you put your weapons down, hide them somewhere, get them away from you?
I'm not going to hurt anybody. I just want them to know that.
I need you to make sure you put those weapons down, though.
There's no way they'll shoot me unless I move aggressively. I just need them to know I'm not going to hurt them.
Is there anybody else around you right now?
No, ma'am, there's nobody around me.
Can you move somewhere safer?
I'll stay where I'm at.
It's a residential area, right? Where would you move to that's safer?
I don't know, I'll just stay here.
Alright, just stay where you are. The officers will be there soon.
